# cgColor

**Instance Property**

A Core Graphics representation of the color.

## Declaration

```swift
var cgColor: CGColor { get }
```

## Discussion

You can get a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGColor] instance from a resolved color.
